      • getTableName

        public java.lang.String getTableName()
        Description copied from interface: Table
        We highly recommend that the class name matches the table name. However, there may be some differences such as lower case or underscores. The table name must not have a dot in it.
        Specified by:
        getTableName in interface Table

      • getFieldNames

        public java.lang.String[] getFieldNames()
        Description copied from interface: Table
        Return an array of the field names. The first one should be the primary key. This is needed because reflection does not guarantee a specific order.
        Specified by:
        getFieldNames in interface Table

      • saveTransactionID

        public boolean saveTransactionID()
        Description copied from interface: Table
        This is true if it has a field for the transaction id. The field must be of type long and named "_tid"
        Specified by:
        saveTransactionID in interface Table
